page.title: 01GHOSTS OF BILBROOK
page.content:
In the small village of Bilbrook, near Washford there are a few old cottages and farmhouses all of wh- ich date back to the 16th century. It has been proved that strange h- appenings have occured all of whi- ch have been hair-raising experie- nces. The first sighting was by a man and his wife, a mr and mrs J.Walt- ers of Wayside cottage.This occur- ed on the late evening of June 12 th, 1981.
Whilst John was relaxing one even- ing reading The Evening Post, he was disturbed by a rustling sound which appeared to be coming from the corn- er of his living room. He looked up from his newspaper and to his amaze- ment he saw the plants shaking viol- ently. He alerted his wife immediat-
